roleset.name: render a bomb safe

example.name: straight transitive
example.text: Lawyers for dozens of insolvent savings and loan associations are trying a new tack in their efforts to defuse suits filed by borrowers , developers and creditors .

propbank.arg: Lawyers for dozens of insolvent savings and loan associations
suits filed by borrowers , developers and creditors

example.name: with manner adverbial
example.text: Earlier this week , Dr. Sullivan tried to defuse these charges by stressing that candidates to head the NIH and the CDC will be judged by `` standards of scientific and administrative excellence , '' not politics .

propbank.arg: by stressing that candidates to head the NIH and the CDC will be judged by `` standards of scientific and administrative excellence , '' not politics

roleset.note: DEFUSE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'defuse' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from defuse.01-v predicate notes)
